document.full_text: ollanta humala has edged into the lead on the eve of peru's presidential election, key polls showed on saturday, one showing him in a statistical tie and the other giving him a narrow win, sources familiar with the data said.
document.title: peru's humala noses ahead on eve of run-off: polls
lines_and_colors: ollanta humala has edged into the lead on the eve of peru's presidential election, key polls showed on saturday, one showing him in a statistical tie and the other giving him a narrow win, sources familiar with the data said.
